definitions.definition: A portion of a culture distinguished by its customs or other features , often in contrast to the larger mainstream culture.
examples: The goth subculture has its own mode of dress, and it has a characteristic musical style.

definitions.definition: A culture made by transferring microorganisms from a previous culture to a fresh growth medium

main_definition: A portion of a culture distinguished by its customs or other features , often in contrast to the larger mainstream culture.
secondary_definitions: ( biology ) A culture made by transferring microorganisms from a previous culture to a fresh growth medium
